thread.title: E. ON Drops Plan to Spin Off German Nuclear Plants
thread.title_full: E. ON Drops Plan to Spin Off German Nuclear Plants - WSJ

author: Friedrich Geiger
title: E. ON Drops Plan to Spin Off German Nuclear Plants
text:
BERLIN—E.ON SE has abandoned plans to spin off its German nuclear power plants and said it would post a hefty net loss this year after booking billions of euros in impairments.
The group will continue with the planned spinoff next year of Uniper, a new company that will own its power generation business inside and outside Europe and global energy trading, E.ON said. But the supervisory board approved the management’s proposal that...
